page.title: 05Childrens' books in 1985
page.content: In 1985 boys and girls of 12 and 13 like totally different types of books. { Girls}read books about{horses}and {animals}and they also like to read adult books like{murders by Agatha {Christie.}For{boys Asterix}books are popular, they are about a Gaulish village in Roman times which likes fighting Romans and feasting. Popular too are adult books like{Dune, Lace {and 1984. { Sports books}are popular with football, fishing and cars for boys and show jumping for girls. Many children read{film books}like James Bond who is a British spy and films, like Gremlins, which 12 and 13 year olds are not allowed to see. { Fighting fantasy books}are half book, half adventure. You have to decide what to do, whether to fight or run away.
